block.p: CIGNA CORP., Philadelphia, named Thomas C. Jones, president of the investment management division, to the additional responsibilities of leading the retirement and investment services division. He succeeds Byron D. Oliver, who is retiring.

NORDSTROM INC., Seattle, named Jim Bromley chief financial officer at its Internet business, taking over duties for Kurt Whitesel, chief operating officer at the unit. Mr. Bromley was most recently chief financial officer at Multiple Zones International Inc.

CIGNA CORP., Philadelphia, named Thomas C. Jones, president of the investment management division, to the additional responsibilities of leading the retirement and investment services division. He succeeds Byron D. Oliver, who is retiring.

NORDSTROM INC., Seattle, named Jim Bromley chief financial officer at its Internet business, taking over duties for Kurt Whitesel, chief operating officer at the unit. Mr. Bromley was most recently chief financial officer at Multiple Zones International Inc.

3COM CORP., Santa Clara, Calif., named Michael E. Rescoe chief financial officer and senior vice president for finance and planning, succeeding Christopher B. Paisley, who is retiring. Mr. Rescoe had been chief financial officer at PG&E Corp.
